Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum scored 37 points, dished out 10 assists, and hauled 4 rebounds in the game.
The Boston Celtics defeated the New York Knicks 132-119.
Pre-Game Insights: The New York Knicks were expected to be serious challengers for the crown.
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections were mentioned in the article.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the season opener for both teams.
Jayson Tatum's impressive performance came despite the presence of defensive aces Mikal Bridges and OG Anunoby.
Others: The Boston Celtics raised their championship banner before the game.
Jayson Tatum's offseason training to work on his stroke paid off against the Knicks.
